info.name: Hotel Inn Istanbul City
info.address: Turgut Ozal Cad. (Millet Cad.) 189 Topkapi 34280 Istanbul, Turkey
info.description: It is located in the very heart
info.longDescription:
Holiday Inn Istanbul City
It is located in the very heart of Istanbul, 3 km away from important historical sites such as Topkapi Palace and the Grand Bazaar.

In addition, tram and bus stops, which provide the city's extensive transportation network, are located right in front of our hotel.

Dream City Istanbul;
A city where Asia and Europe meet with its historical and natural beauties. A great heritage preserved within the walls.
